text.section:
If, within 5 days after the date on which the notice to post security is mailed to a person, the person submits to the tax collector a written request for a hearing, the tax collector shall:
hold the hearing; and
at the hearing, make a final determination of the necessity for, propriety of, and amount of the security.
The tax collector shall mail the person a notice of the final determination.
